segments.advisor_message: Okay so uh let's go over some basic info to start. I see that your first name is uh, 'John'?
segments.client_message: Yeah, yeah that's right, it's John, but like, I usually go by Johnny instead. Um, that's what my friends call me.

segments.advisor_message: Great, Johnny! And, uh, what's your last name again?
segments.client_message: It's uh, Smith, you know like the common one. Not really that special or anything.

segments.advisor_message: Alright, so John Smith, or Johnny. And do you have any middle names or, uh, any other details like, uh, date of birth?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah! My middle name is Lee, and I was born on 15-04-1985. Just a regular date, nothing fancy.
